Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 82nd overall pick, by Ashburn in 1980...
Injured on 6/26/1983 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/30/1986 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1987, off Dan Coley (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1987, off John Fried (CC)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Traded from Ashburn to Halifax on 2/19/1989 (Going to HAL: CF H. Lopez, P B. Castilla. Going to Ash: RF T. Peoples)...
